channel.title: Dumping from one cfg file to another?
channel.description: Is there a way to dump from one cfg file to another? Because i want it to auto-matically update something when i run the server, thanks.

item.title: Dumping from one cfg file to another?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

No, its not like that, i just want to dump npc drops so i can post the percent etc on forums because people are whining they donâ€™t know what drops what, so i just need it to dump each time i load the server, so its easyer.
